definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: You'll report to me here. Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是领事馆的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布尔。

sentences.english: The president tried to sweep the embarassing incident under the rug.
sentences.chinese: 总统试图隐瞒领事馆事件。

sentences.english: For more details please contact your nearest Brunei Embassy or diplomatic representative.
sentences.chinese: 请向您附近的汶莱大使馆或领事馆查询最新详情。

sentences.english: What is the phone-number of the consulate?
sentences.chinese: 领事馆的电话号码是多少？

sentences.english: Britain once set up its consulate in Tengchong in 1899.
sentences.chinese: 英国曾于1899年在腾冲设立领事馆。

sentences.english: As soon as the formalities had been got over, the consulate was quick to issue the work permit.
sentences.chinese: 正式手续一办完，领事馆就很快签发了工作许可证。

sentences.english: Senior officials of the German Consulate in Chennai were present.
sentences.chinese: 德国驻钦奈领事馆的高级官员出席活动。

sentences.english: I am going to the Chinese Consulate General at 520, 12th Ave.
sentences.chinese: 我到第12条大街520号的中国总领事馆。
你可以打电话给领事馆吗？

sentences.english: It also maintains close liaison with local consulate officials.
sentences.chinese: 该科也与本港各领事馆官员保持密切联络。

sentences.english: Consuls and members of foreign chambers ever paid visits to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 驻穗各领事馆官员和外国商会多次到我院考察参观。

sentences.english: Last year, we celebrated the 30th anniversary of the re-opening of the consulate.
sentences.chinese: 去年我们庆祝了上海领事馆复馆30周年。

sentences.english: It was the Consulate-General of China to Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻维也纳总领事馆也。

sentences.english: Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是领事馆的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布尔。

sentences.english: Sixth, China welcomes Brunei to open consulates general in Shanghai and Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 第六，中方欢迎文莱在香港和上海开设总领事馆。

sentences.english: Similar protests were also staged outside the Japanese consulate general in Shenyang.
sentences.chinese: 类似的抗议活动还在沈阳总领事馆前举行。

definition: consulate general/same as 總領事館|总领事馆[zong3 ling3 shi4 guan3]
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
foreign concession, an enclave occupied by a foreign power (in China in the 19th and 20th centuries)
